attributes.action: force senior politicans to practice what they preach
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government are forever telling us we should do, particular in relation to the environment but they rarely practice what they preach. They still drive round in jags and other gas guzzlers

rejection.details: The title must be a specific call for action
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
